reviews.review_text: I have fine wavy curly hair and this product is perfect for me. It’s easy to spread the product throughout my hair and it dries with an easy to scrunch out cast. Left me with frizz free & bouncy curls!

reviews.review_title: Great, but it depends on what you use with it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this product (with the light moisture spray from Adwoa), I admit, I wasn’t impressed. I have fine curly hair (3b-3c) that frizzes easily, and I like when my curls are elongated, springy, and defined. However, I paired this with a curl crème that had no shea butter and was aloe based, and noticed I found the curl definition I was looking for. Now, I use it daily, and love it! So just check to see what curl based cream works for you before you use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for a quick way to fight curl frizz! It leaves a great shine and light smell to my curls and I love that it’s a clean product without nasty extra chemicals I avoid from other brands. Unfortunately I wouldn’t purchase or use in my daily rotation due to my sensitivity to fragrance.
